alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 19 at 8:56PM AKST until January 22 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible. * WHERE...Glacier Bay, Eastern Chichagof Island, Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait and City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow expected to be wet and heavy with a change over to rain possible sometime Monday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay
